message:
Dear Geeks , 
Don't miss this event , i am proud to be one of the instructor's students and i am sure that it will be great isAllah
Register Now and Reserve your seat , you won't regret ;)
http://foe.pitechnologies.net/index.php#register

( Don't Forget to check your mail and receive your Code )
story: Asmaa Matar shared PiTech Esd's event to the group: Egyptian Geeks.

32.name: The Internet of Things( Embedded System From Scratch)

name: The Internet of Things( Embedded System From Scratch)
caption: The Internet of Things( Embedded System From Scratch)
description:
Internet is the heart of our life , there has been much hype about the “Internet of Things”.

The idea of a globally interconnected continuum of devices, objects and things .
  
Embedded system Development industry play an important role in shaping the Future of " Internet of Things" .
                                 
                                      **       **      ** 
Place: Faculty Of Engineering , Cairo University .
Hall : 8310 , Communication Building .
Day : Sunday 24 November.
Time : from 3:00 Pm to 5:00 Pm .

The Event  Program :
( From 3:00 Pm to 5:00 Pm )
Eng. Mahmoud Sayed

- What is the "Internet  of things ? "
- What do we mean by embedded system devices?
- A gentle  Introduction to embedded System


                                      **       **      ** 

To attend this session , You have to register and receive your code .

Register @
http://foe.pitechnologies.net/index.php#register

( Don't Forget to check your mail and receive your Code )


The instructor Biography :

Eng. Mahmoud Sayed .

Mahmoud Sayed  is Business Development Manager at PiTechnologies Inc., 

Mahmoud  current responsibilities is to  Expand the company business in Embedded system and Mobile Application across MENA region .

Mahmoud also is the technical instructor for Embedded system Development Track in faculty of computer and information FCI -Cairo university, Ain Shams university and Assiut university  as professor of practice 

Mahmoud was leading the joint supervision for the graduation projects in the following areas :

 Simulation of HSDPA / HSUPA Protocol ( High Speed Downlink / Uplink Packet Access ) .

 Simulation and implementation of ZIGBEE Protocol 802.15.4-20 .

Objects Monitor  through sensor networks nodes .


Prior to his current position, Mahmoud  worked as Senior Software Engineer at PiTechnologies .

In 2009, Mahmoud received his B.Sc. degree from Cairo University. - Faculty of Engineering - Electronics and Communication Department  

And prior to that Mahmoud was VP at CECE student activity in Cairo University
